title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Calculus Fundamentals: Practical Applications Using Multiple Representations and Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain the average and instantaneous rates of change of functions using multiple representations (graphs/tables/equations).
Learners can apply the concept of derivatives to real-world problems (e.g., speed/cost optimization) and propose solutions.
Learners achieve a formative assessment pass rate of over 80% when using 10-minute microlearning modules for periodic review.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
